GSD.product_version: versions from v3.8 to before v5.10.122
GSD.description:
ata: pata_octeon_cf: Fix refcount leak in octeon_cf_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit 19cb3ece14547cb1ca2021798aaf49a3f82643d1, it was introduced in version v3.8 by commit 43f01da0f2794b464ade2ffe1f780c69d7ce7b75. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ata: pata_octeon_cf: Fix refcount leak in octeon_cf_probe
